mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_plans (user_id, goal, persona, roadmap_json, start_date, progress_rate, status, is_paid, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{goal}, #{persona}, #{roadmapJson}, NOW(), #{progressRate}, #{status}, #{isPaid}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM study_plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'PROCEEDING' ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE study_plans SET progress_rate = #{progressRate}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE study_plans SET goal = #{goal}, roadmap_json = #{roadmapJson}, progress_rate = #{progressRate}, status = #{status}, is_paid = #{isPaid} WHERE id = #{id}
